info.description:
Sequence data for Trypanosome brucei strain TREU (Trypanosomiasis Research Edinburgh University) 927/4 were downloaded from GeneDB (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. brucei was conducted by The Sanger Institute pathogen sequencing unit and TIGR.

info.displayName: T.brucei gambiense chromosomes sequence and annotation
info.description: This resource includes chromosome sequences and annotations for Trypanosoma brucei gambiense obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute. Please visit GeneDB for project details and data release policies.

resource.pluginArgs: --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Tbruceibrucei927.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

resource.pluginArgs: --contact @@TriTrypSageTags.Contact@@ --arrayDesignName 'T.brucei gambiense SAGE Tags' --arrayDesignVersion '1' --studyName 'Transcriptome analysis of two life stages of Trypanosoma brucei gambiense' --studyDescription '' --freqFile @@dataDir@@/freqs.tsv

info.displayName: T. brucei gambiense Experimental DGE tags Frequencies
info.institution: Wellcome Trust Center for Molecular Parasitology
info.description:
Frequencies of tags that were observed in studies using RNA from T. brucei gambiense.

The digital gene expression (DGE) tags represent a 21 bp tag usually from the first NlaIII restriction site upstream of the poly A tail on mRNA transcript. A detailed description of the method and experiment is available in Veitch et al ( Veitch NJ, Johnson PCD, Trivedi U, Terry S, Wildridge D and MacLeod A. Digital gene expression analysis of two life-cycle stages of the human-infective parasite, Trypanosoma brucei gambiense reveals differentially expressed clusters of co-regulated genes. BMC Genomics, 2010, 11:124-137). DGE tags were created from three procyclic-form and three bloodstream-form Trypanosoma brucei gambiense STIB386 in vitro cultures. The 21bp tags have been aligned to the T.b.brucei 927 and T.b.gambiense Dal genome databases, allowing for up to a 2 bp mismatch. Tags that only align once to the genome are represented, so tags that are not unique are not present. The differential expression of bloodstream-form versus procyclic-form T.b.gambiense DGE tags is available to view for each tag.

Publication is available from the PubMed http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20175885

Digital gene expression analysis of two life cycle stages of the human-infective parasite, Trypanosoma brucei gambiense reveals differentially expressed clusters of co-regulated genes. BMC Genomics. 2010 Feb 22;11:124.
